meanings.definition: The wrinkles at the outer corner of the eyes.
meanings.sent1: She smiled, causing crowfeet to appear at the corners of her eyes.
meanings.sent2: As she aged, crowfeet started to form around her eyes.
meanings.sent3: The crowfeet around his eyes made him look wise beyond his years.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter etched crowfeet around her eyes like delicate lace.
meanings.sent5: The crowfeet around her eyes told the story of a life filled with laughter and joy.

meanings.definition: A plant with small, white flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the crowfeet bloomed beautifully with their small, white flowers.
meanings.sent2: The crowfeet in the meadow added a touch of elegance with their delicate white blooms.
meanings.sent3: The crowfeet plant in the backyard attracted butterflies with its pretty white flowers.
meanings.sent4: She picked a bouquet of crowfeet to brighten up the room with their dainty white blossoms.
meanings.sent5: The crowfeet in the vase brought a sense of freshness with their tiny, white petals.

meanings.definition: To develop wrinkles at the outer corner of the eyes.
meanings.sent1: Over time, her face began to crowfeet, showing the passage of years.
